description: This table contains forms which correspond to log images.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the for record.

columns.name: FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: FORM_LIST_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the form in the log.
